With the release of our 15 days to christmas specials, all 25 days to christmas offers are no longer valid.

For our new offers, there is simply one price and the same specs across the three locations.  Keep in mind that these plans are limited in number.

1 vCore
1GB RAM
1GB Swap
50GB HDD
500GB Bandwidth
£20/yr

[Order Australia @ 250mbps](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=472)
[Order Germany @ 1gbps](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=470)
[Order Canada @ 250mbps](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=471)
